explains: pron. 我们自己；我们亲自
wordGroup: by ourselves 我们自己；独自地
between ourselves 只限于咱们之间；秘密的

sentences.en: The only people there were ourselves.
sentences.cn: 那里仅有的人就是我们自己。

sentences.en: We started off by introducing ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们一开始先进行自我介绍。

sentences.en: We shouldn't blame ourselves for what happened.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该为发生的事责怪自己。
